EmailTemplate.name: CAC Complaint Ad-hoc Email Template
EmailTemplate.subject: New Complaint pending for your feedback
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Dealer,
This is a new Smart Pre-sales Complaint sent to you, please find the Complaint information as below.
